sentence: The push for unionization has received support from Wisconsin Democrats U.S. Sen. Tammy Baldwin and Rep. Mark Pocan, as well as Democratic Senate candidates Alex Lasry and Mandela Barnes, Wisconsin's lieutenant governor.
author: Piet Levy
title: Employees of Pabst Theater Group in Milwaukee are trying to form a union

sentence: Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry poured $3.45 million into his campaign in the first three months of the year, while state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski added $1.5 million to her campaign, according to statements issued Thursday.
author: Bill Glauber
title: Bucks executive Alex Lasry, Wisconsin Treasurer Sarah Godlewski spend big in Democratic U.S. Senate race

sentence: Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry's campaign said he raised $3.9 million during the period.

title: Johnson raises $7.1 million in first quarter

sentence: Texts from friends alerted Alex Lasry that gunfire was erupting outside Fiserv Forum at the end of Friday night's Milwaukee Bucks playoff game.

title: Democratic U.S. Senate candidate Alex Lasry calls for more cops on the street, tighter gun laws

sentence: A recent Marquette University Law School Poll showed a race that appeared to be tightening, with Barnes leading Alex Lasry, on leave from his executive job with the Milwaukee Bucks.
author: Bill Glauber
title: U.S. Sen. Elizabeth Warren praises Mandela Barnes, calls out Ron Johnson during Milwaukee appearance
